name: The Computer (Pikakid98)
description:
Overview

The Computer Is A Point And Click Game Made In Game Maker Studio By Pikakid98. It Features A 5 Episode System Each With Their Own Story

Story

You Play As 5 Different People With 5 Different Stories. All Of Which Involve A Computer And The Anti-Virus AI Known As AVA (Anti-Virus Assistant). But Not All Is As It Seems

Available Episodes

  • Chapter 1: The Fired
